metadata.Title: CVE-2022-33064 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An off-by-one error in function wav_read_header in src/wav.c in Libsndfile 1.1.0, results in a write out of bound, which allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code, Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-10-26, there is no upstream fix for this issue

criterions.comment: libsndfile: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
